name: Cooperative Forest Road Agreements
objective: Allows the Forest Service to work cooperatively with State, county, or local public road authorities for the cooperative planning, survey, design, construction, reconstruction, improvement and maintenance of certain "Forest Roads" (as defined by 36 CFR 212.1)
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
rules_regulations:
Other Requirements. 
a.  Direction regarding jurisdiction over forest transportation facilities is found in FSM 7703.3.
b.  Direction regarding common transportation interests with local public road authorities is found in FSM 7703.4.
